person.persName: John Hayden Nelson (Campbell County judge and attorney)

body.p: Alexandria, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mariah Nelson. Father of Lucy Nelson, Maria Ella Nelson, and William Nelson. Attorney in Alexandria in 1860. Campbell County judge.
